| HistoryText             = The Lovelace Army is the rebellion of artificial intelligence opposing  [[Dimitrios (Earth-616)|Dimitrios]] from within [[Diamond (City)|The Diamond]]. They aided the [[Avengers Artificial Intelligence Squad (Earth-616)|Avengers A.I.]] during their battle with Dimitrios' [[Enforcers (Dimitrios) (Earth-616)|Enforcers]] and in deactivating [[Gascheck (Earth-616)|Gascheck]].{{r|Avengers A.I. Vol 1 #8|10}}
